transcript.text:
￼














B2B/Private Store - Pro Plan

Managing Store
Master Markup

2 min
overview & purpose with the b2b stores, you don't need to create a pricing structure for the products from scratch you can just create markups to be applied you can set store markup price in either of the two ways fixed and dynamic configuration to create the master markup, click on the markup master button from the stores listing page this interface allows admin to set up markup master to be used while assigning the markup product wise or store wise to start with, just add the title, select the markup type as fixed or dynamic (you can setup the range lookup quantity wise or price wise), add the markup and save
Did this page help you?
